title: verify_getinstructoranalytics_returns_correct_metrics
description: Test the getInstructorAnalytics API to ensure it correctly calculates and returns the total number of students, total revenue from succeeded payments, and average ratings for a given instructor.

title: validate_getcoursestudents_returns_realtime_progress_and_profile
description: Test the getCourseStudents API to verify it retrieves real-time progress data and profile information for all students enrolled in a specified course.

title: check_getinstructorcourses_lists_all_courses_by_instructor
description: Test the getInstructorCourses API to confirm it returns a complete list of all courses created by a specific instructor.

title: validate_getcourseearnings_fetches_detailed_earning_records
description: Test the getCourseEarnings API to ensure it fetches detailed earning records accurately for all courses associated with an instructor.

title: verify_getstudentenrollments_returns_recent_enrollments
description: Test the getStudentEnrollments API to check it returns the 10 most recent student enrollments for the courses of a given instructor.
